thread.title: Comcast joins Apple, Google in smart home device game
thread.title_full: Comcast joins Apple, Google in smart home device game - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Comcast joins Apple, Google in smart home device game
text:
Photo: Connor Radnovich, The Chronicle Daniel Herscovici explains a garage door security system integrated into the Xfinity Home App at the Comcast offices in San Francisco, California, on Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. Daniel Herscovici explains a garage door security system integrated...
Comcast is joining Apple and Google in the race to convince customers that they need Internet-connected smart home devices like thermostats, lights and garage door openers. Daniel Herscovici explains a garage door security system integrated into the Xfinity Home App at the Comcast offices in San Francisco, California, on Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. Daniel Herscovici explains a garage door security system integrated...
Comcast is joining Apple and Google in the race to convince customers that they need Internet-connected smart home devices like thermostats, lights and garage door openers.
